Network connections to destinations iden.Action: Analyze Zeek dns.log for queries to domains exhibiting characteristics of DGA (high entropy, low dictionary word proportion). Calculate entropy and other statistical measures for queried domain names. Flag and investigate connections (Zeek conn.log) to domains identified as potentially algorithmically generated.

Network connections to recently register.Action: Monitor Zeek dns.log for queries to external domains. Enrich domain data with registration age and global visit frequency data from external sources. Flag connections (Zeek conn.log) to domains that are recently registered or have very low global visitation counts.
